sn45.16:4.2: “Mendicants, these eight things don’t arise to be purified, bright, spotless, rid of taints except when a Realized One, a Perfected One, a fully awakened Buddha has appeared.
sn45.16:4.5: right view, right motivation, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, and right samādhi.
sn45.16:4.7: These eight things don’t arise to be purified, bright, spotless, and rid of taints except when a Realized One, a Perfected One, a fully awakened Buddha has appeared.”
